physical_examinations.vital_signs: Blood pressure elevated, but never reached malignant range. Serum cortisol was 17Î¼g/dl two mornings after admission. Serum lithium level was 0.7 meq/liter 20 hours after admission.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Initially agitated, barefoot, wearing soiled clothes, and bruised from skirmishes with ambulance staff. Presented with abrupt onset of mania characterized by insomnia, belligerence, and irrational speech.
